name: Các cách diễn đạt liên quan đến màu sắc (Expressions related to colors)

words.example: The garden was full of colorful flowers.
After the long illness, her face looked pale.

words.vietnamese: Đỏ mặt (do xấu hổ hoặc ngượng ngùng)
words.example: She blushed when he complimented her.
His face turned red with anger.

words.vietnamese: Bị lỗ, thâm hụt (trong kinh doanh)
words.example: The company has been in the red for two consecutive quarters.
When he saw the damage, he started to see red.
She was green with envy when her friend won the lottery.
The job offer came completely out of the blue.
My brother lives abroad, so I only see him once in a blue moon.
